translation.en: [woman over radio] Someone is calling you home...
♪ 'Cause it's another day For you and me in paradise ♪
-[man] Hey, what's up? -Code.
translation.it: ROY HARDAWAY COME SOPRAVVIVERE A HOLLYWOOD - Ciao, come va? - Code.

translation.en: -Yeah? -It's good to hear your voice.
translation.it: - Sì? - È bello sentire la tua voce.

translation.en: Holy shit. Lisa?
Are you okay? I haven't heard from you in months.
translation.it: Stai bene? Non ti sento da mesi.

translation.en: I was afraid you were dead.
[Lisa] I've been up in the woods working on that short film I told you about.
translation.it: Ero nei boschi a girare quel corto di cui ti parlavo.

translation.en: Must have lost track of time.
translation.it: Devo aver perso la cognizione del tempo.

translation.en: Yeah. I know how you get. So you back in New York?
translation.it: Sì, so come sei fatta. Sei tornata a New York?

translation.en: I'm an hour outside L.A. Wait, what?
translation.it: - Sono a un'ora da Los Angeles. - Cosa?

translation.en: Do you know the name Lou Burke?
Lou Burke? Yeah, of course I do.
Apparently, he wants to meet with me.
Lis, that's huge.
Listen, I need a place to crash. Can I use your couch?
translation.it: Mi servirebbe un posto dove dormire. Il tuo divano, magari?

translation.en: Are you kidding? Yeah, of course. Anything you need.
translation.it: Ma certo, non chiederlo neanche. Tutto, per te.

translation.en: I'm at 4837 Traction, downtown.
translation.it: Abito al 4837 di Traction Avenue, in centro.

translation.en: I knew I could count on you.
translation.it: Sapevo di poter contare su di te.

translation.en: -I'm glad you're not dead. -Me too. See you soon, Code.
translation.it: - Sono felice che tu non sia morta. - Anch'io. A presto, Code.

translation.en: ♪ I'm the one, natural one, make it easy ♪
[Lisa] How's your band doing? -Heard you're selling drugs now, too. -Shh!
translation.it: Come va la tua band? Ho sentito che ora vendi droga.

translation.en: [whispering] Christine's asleep.
-Who the fuck is Christine? -My girlfriend. She lives here too.
translation.it: - E chi cazzo è? - La mia ragazza. Viviamo insieme.

translation.en: Your-- Is she gonna mind me being here?
translation.it: La tua… Non le darà fastidio la mia presenza?

translation.en: No, no, no. I mean... -No, I'm sure it'll be fine. -[chuckles]
translation.it: No, no. Insomma… No, sicuramente le andrà bene.

translation.en: I mean, you get along with everybody, right?
translation.it: Tu vai d'accordo con tutti, no?

translation.en: You said, you'd never come to L.A.
translation.it: Dicevi che non saresti mai venuta a Los Angeles.

translation.en: Guess I changed my mind.
Your actress friend didn't wanna come?
translation.it: La tua amica attrice non è voluta venire?

translation.en: Something happen in the woods?
You know. People tend to get fucked up around me.
translation.it: Sai, chi mi sta intorno di solito finisce per dare di matto.

translation.en: Not me.
You want this?
-Nah, I'm good. -Thank you.
-Night. -Goodnight.
-So you used to date my boyfriend. -I wouldn't say date exactly.
translation.it: - Quindi, stavi col mio ragazzo? - Non stavamo insieme.

translation.en: It looked like you were sleeping with your eyes open. It was gross.
translation.it: Sembrava dormissi con gli occhi aperti. Disgustoso.

translation.en: Sorry.
So he said you might need to crash here for a minute or so,
translation.it: Mi ha detto che forse ti fermerai un po' qui,

translation.en: and I'm totally good with that if you do.
Just... If you wanna take a shower,
translation.it: Se vuoi farti una doccia, però,

translation.en: use the hallway bathroom, not the one by our bedroom.
translation.it: usa il bagno in corridoio, non quello vicino alla nostra camera.

translation.en: And sometimes when you pull the thingy for the shower,
seems like nothing's gonna happen, and then it goes, like, ca-chunk!
translation.it: sembra che non esca nulla, ma poi, di colpo, eccola.

translation.en: And then... Pssh! Like, it spits right in your eye.
translation.it: E, beh, ti finisce dritta nell'occhio.

translation.en: Are you, like, an actress or something?
Filmmaker.
Good for you.
It's a very tough town.
It takes years just to get a break.
What do you do?
I'm in real estate.
Morning.
-[Christine] Hey, babe. [chuckles] -[Code] Hey.
Get off your butt, Lis. Don't you have that meeting with Lou Burke?
translation.it: Forza, alzati, Lis. Non devi incontrare Lou Burke?

translation.en: [Christine] Lou Burke?
[Lisa] Mr. Burke.
Jesus, you're not much older than my son.
Sit. [clears throat]
And call me Lou. Never Mr. Burke.
translation.it: E chiamami Lou. "Sig. Burke" non esiste.

translation.en: Okay. Lou. How'd you get my short film? I sent it to a few people, but--
translation.it: Ok, Lou. Come hai avuto il mio corto? L'ho inviato a un po' di persone, ma…

translation.en: You know those nights you wake up every 20 minutes from a different dream?
translation.it: Hai presente quando ti svegli ogni 20 minuti da un sogno diverso?

translation.en: My wife thinks I should see a sleep guy, but I love my dreams.
translation.it: Secondo mia moglie ho dei problemi, ma io adoro i miei sogni.

translation.en: I dream about the birds. Oh, hello. Thank you.
translation.it: Sogno di uccelli. Oh, ciao. Grazie.

translation.en: Falcons, actually.
I raise Arctic Peregrines. Like nature's 200-mile-an-hour missile.
translation.it: Allevo falchi pellegrini, i missili supersonici naturali.

translation.en: I had three, but one killed Glenn Close's Pekingese,
translation.it: Ne avevo tre, ma uno ha ucciso il pechinese di Glenn Close,

translation.en: and now I've got two. Thank you.
translation.it: quindi ora ne ho due. Grazie.

translation.en: You're having coffee with sushi.
I drink this coffee with everything. Comayagua!
translation.it: Bevo questo caffè con tutto. Comayagua!

translation.en: Ship it in from Honduras.
My assistant makes sure my favorite spots have it on hand.
translation.it: Deve esserci in tutti i miei ristoranti preferiti.

translation.en: -Very cool. So-- -What's your story?
translation.it: - Fico. Quindi… - Allora, di dove sei?

translation.en: Not from L.A., I take it.
No, I'm from Brazil, actually.
translation.it: No. Vengo dal Brasile, in realtà.

translation.en: My father is a botanist. He was looking for corpse vines--
translation.it: Mio padre è un botanico ed era lì per cercare delle viti morte…

translation.en: I feel like you're flicking puzzle pieces at me.
translation.it: Non raccontarmi la tua storia a pezzi.

translation.en: -He was looking for a corpse vine? -What are we doing here?
translation.it: - Cercava una vite morta? - Cosa stai facendo?

translation.en: I wanted to meet you.
That's how meetings work.
translation.it: E agli incontri ci si conosce.

translation.en: [in English] Japanese scallops.
[sighs] I saw a tape sitting on a desk and...
translation.it: Ho visto una pellicola sulla scrivania

translation.en: I don't know. I had this voice in my head.
translation.it: e, non so, sentivo questa vocina che mi diceva:

translation.en: "Pick up this video tape.
Pick it up."
It's a true story.
That sound crazy? Probably does.
So you liked my movie.
translation.it: Ti è piaciuto il mio film?

translation.en: [Lou] So, what do we got?
It's tense.
And scary.
And, um...
My God, that ending.
I mean, those special effects when she...
Well, I don't wanna get too gory over lunch.
translation.it: Non voglio essere troppo sanguinoso a pranzo.

translation.en: So the question is what's the full-length,
translation.it: La mia domanda è: com'è la versione lunga

translation.en: major-motion-picture, opens-on-1500-screens-nationwide version?
translation.it: con una produzione importante e che debutterà in 1.500 sale negli USA?

translation.en: Well, what it's really about, to me, is...
translation.it: Beh, per me il fulcro del film è…

translation.en: this woman.
She's got this thing. But she doesn't know how to use it yet.
translation.it: Ha questa cosa dentro di sé, ma non sa ancora come usarla.

translation.en: Like a superpower. Right? Her eyes already do that thing.
translation.it: Una specie di superpotere che scaturisce dagli occhi.

translation.en: Yeah, but other people wanna take it from her.
translation.it: Ma la gente vuole sottrarle questo potere.

translation.en: They wanna suck her dry and don't care if they kill her in the process.
translation.it: Vogliono risucchiarglielo anche a costo di ucciderla.

translation.en: So this woman, she has to learn how to use this thing against them.
translation.it: Quindi, lei deve imparare a usarlo contro di loro

translation.en: If she wants to make it out alive.
-Okay. -It's a paranoid thriller.
Woman on the run. Right? I've been looking for something like this.
translation.it: Una donna in fuga. Giusto? Cercavo proprio una cosa del genere.

translation.en: Okay, so let's do a director wish list. Right?
translation.it: Ok, facciamo una lista di chi vorresti a dirigere il film.

translation.en: I'm directing.
Okay.
I mean, a rookie director is a tough sell.
translation.it: Una regista alle prime armi? Non sarà un'impresa facile.

translation.en: You'd have to sell yourself as a...
young female Cronenberg, uh...
Truth is, I've been looking to take more chances.
translation.it: La verità è che cercavo nuove occasioni,

translation.en: You know, maybe you're the chance I've been looking to take.
translation.it: e forse tu sei proprio quella che volevo cogliere,

translation.en: But you need to learn to persuade people that you're the one to make this.
translation.it: ma devi imparare a convincere la gente che sei la persona giusta per farlo.

translation.en: So you'll help me out.
That's great.
And that's the thing. Not everything can be taught. Some things have to be experienced...
translation.it: Il punto è che non si può insegnare tutto. Di certe cose bisogna fare esperienza.

translation.en: Holy fucking shit. Roy Hardaway?
Is that Roy-fucking-Hardaway? Oh, my God! It is!
translation.it: Sei Roy Hardaway, cazzo? Oh, mio Dio, sì che sei tu!

translation.en: -How's it going, Lou? Good to see you. -How the fuck are ya, huh?
translation.it: - Come va? Che bello vederti. - Come te la passi?

translation.en: Yeah. Oh, Roy, this is Lisa Nova. Lisa Nova, Roy Hardaway.
translation.it: Bene. Roy, ti presento Lisa Nova. Lisa, lui è Roy Hardaway.

translation.en: The actor.
I know who he is. Hi.
[Lou] You gotta try the monkfish liver. It's next-level.
translation.it: Devi provare il fegato di rana pescatrice.

translation.en: It's mind blowing, like having a woman undress in your mouth.
translation.it: È pazzesco. È come avere una donna nuda in bocca.

translation.en: Am I gonna see you at the Alvin Sender...?
[Roy] Not sure yet. I haven't decided.
translation.it: Non ho ancora deciso se venire.

translation.en: -[Roy] It was nice to meet you, Lisa. -Yes. You too.
translation.it: - È stato un piacere, Lisa. - Sì, anche per me.

translation.en: So I'm assuming this is you?
translation.it: Immagino che questa sia la tua auto.

translation.en: Yes, that's me.
-You living out of this thing? -Actually, yes, I am.
translation.it: - Ci vivi dentro? - A dire il vero, sì.

translation.en: Jesus.
Home sweet home.
Tell you what.
I'm gonna option your short.
We'll make the feature just the way you want it.
translation.it: Ne faremo un lungometraggio esattamente come vuoi tu.

translation.en: Consider this a deposit.
I'll send over a contract. Have a lawyer look it over.
translation.it: Ti invio il contratto, fallo vedere al tuo avvocato.

translation.en: Okay.
-[engine starts] -Consider an apartment.
Why?
Do you want?
Oh, no, thank you. I'm not hungry, but thanks.
translation.it: No, grazie. Non ho fame. Grazie, però.

translation.en: When the bandages come off, she'll look like Daryl Hannah.
translation.it: Quando toglierà le bende, sarà come Daryl Hannah.

translation.en: Cher wasn't built in a day.
translation.it: Cher non si è fatta in un giorno.

translation.en: So is it legit?
Nothing seems shady.
You should get a lawyer.
[Lisa] I can't afford one.
Jules says it looks legit.
Well, if Jules Brandenberg says so.
translation.it: Se lo dice Jules Brandenberg, allora…

translation.en: I know what a contract looks like. I have a movie in development.
translation.it: So com'è un contratto. Sto facendo un film.

translation.en: -He directed our video, babe. -Meaningless.
translation.it: - Ha girato il nostro video. - Non significa nulla.

translation.en: You're gonna be huge, baby.
[mouths] Thank you.
Lou Burke. Wow.
He hasn't had a hit in a few years, but I love Breaking Point.
translation.it: Non fa film di successo da anni, ma adoro Breaking Point.

translation.en: Good for you.
Thanks. So does the contract protect me as the director? Can I be fired?
translation.it: Grazie. Quindi, il contratto mi tutela in quanto regista? Possono licenziarmi?

translation.en: No producer hires a director they can't replace if the director sucks.
translation.it: Nessun produttore assume un regista che non può sostituire.

translation.en: In theory, they could fire Steven Spielberg if they want to.
translation.it: Potrebbero licenziare persino Spielberg, se facesse pena.

translation.en: But, yeah,
this says, you, Lisa Natasha Nova, are directing the movie.
translation.it: c'è scritto che dirigerai tu il film, Lisa Natasha Nova.

translation.en: Just don't suck.
You think I could meet him?
[Christine] It's kind of a shithole, but you can't afford anything that isn't.
translation.it: Non è un granché, ma non puoi permetterti nulla di più.

translation.en: The great news is it's furnished.
Or someone abandoned the furniture in here.
translation.it: O comunque qualcuno ha lasciato qui dei mobili.

translation.en: But either way, you can use it.
translation.it: Il punto è che puoi usarli.

translation.en: ♪ Drifting in a day not yet begun♪
translation.it: BASATO SU UNA STORIA VERA BAMBINA, 10 ANNI, UCCIDE BAMBINI

translation.en: I love this place.
Careful at night. There's coyotes all around here.
translation.it: Sta' attenta di notte. Qui ci sono i coyote.

translation.en: -There's whats? -Coyotes.
They're fucking dangerous.
Feels kinda haunted.
Maybe you'll hear some silent film actress sobbing all night.
translation.it: Magari sentirai un'attrice di film muti che singhiozza di notte.

translation.en: Maybe she slit her wrists in the clawfoot tub.
translation.it: Magari si è tagliata le vene nella vasca coi piedini.

translation.en: [Christine] Not a clawfoot.
I always wanted a penthouse.
[Christine] The top floor of a walkup is not a penthouse.
translation.it: Un ultimo piano senza ascensore non è un attico.

translation.en: [whispers] Coyotes.
[whispers] Coyotes.
[Lou] So let's talk about Lisa Nova.
Can you sell me Lisa Nova?
You mean sell my movie idea?
No, actually, I don't. Everybody's got an idea.
There's only one you.
translation.it: Ma di te ci sei solo tu.

translation.en: So who are you?
Sell yourself to me.
Okay.
So, I'm sure you hear this all the time, but I'm not like every other director.
translation.it: Sicuramente te lo diranno tutti, ma non sono una regista qualunque.

translation.en: Oh, you're not?
I witness a murder. Right?
I saw the guy. Got a good look at him. Now all the cops are standing around,
translation.it: Ho visto l'assassino per bene. E ora sono circondato dai poliziotti,

translation.en: the sketch artist has her pad and her pencils,
translation.it: la ritrattista è pronta per l'identikit

translation.en: and everyone's waiting with bated breath and I say,
translation.it: e tutti aspettano con ansia, ma io dico:

translation.en: "The killer was not like a jellyfish."
-Don't tell me what you're not. -Copy that.
translation.it: - Non dirmi cosa non sei. - Ricevuto.

translation.en: Don't worry, you're still young. We'll keep going until we get it right.
translation.it: Non preoccuparti, sei ancora giovane. Continueremo finché non lo azzeccheremo.

translation.en: ♪ Even the air in here has jelled ♪
translation.it: ERO UNA BAMBINA CHE VIVEVA A SÃO...

translation.en: -[Lou] You okay? You look tired. -[Lisa] I didn't get much sleep.
translation.it: - Tutto ok? Sembri stanca. - Non sto dormendo molto.

translation.en: [Lou] Go again. Go.
I grew up loving movies.
When I was a kid, in São Conrado, my dad had a projector,
translation.it: Da piccola, a São Conrado, mio padre aveva un proiettore,

translation.en: -and I used to watch-- -Let me tell you about a guy.
translation.it: - e io guardavo… - Ti racconto di un tizio.

translation.en: His name's Alvin Sender, and he's rich as sin.
translation.it: Si chiama Alvin Sender, ed è ricco da far schifo.

translation.en: What makes him unique is he loves finding new talent.
translation.it: La sua unicità è il suo amore per la scoperta di nuovi talenti.

translation.en: You know the Sex, Lies, and Videotape kid? Alvin's financing his next project.
translation.it: Produrrà il nuovo progetto dell'attore di Sesso, bugie e videotape.

translation.en: Problem is a lot of people ask Alvin for money.
translation.it: Il problema è che in tanti gli chiedono soldi.

translation.en: And believe me when I tell you, they all grew up loving movies.
translation.it: E, fidati: tutti sono cresciuti amando il cinema.

translation.en: So, what makes you different?
Maybe I'm just not good at this whole pitching myself thing.
translation.it: Forse non sono brava a vendere me stessa.

translation.en: When I was a kid, I was in a really bad accident.
translation.it: Da piccolo, io ebbi un brutto incidente

translation.en: Stuck in a bed for the better part of a year.
translation.it: che mi confinò a letto per quasi un anno.

translation.en: Worst part, I couldn't go to the movies.
translation.it: La cosa peggiore fu il non poter andare al cinema.

translation.en: And a movie theater was my church, it was everything to me.
translation.it: Il cinema era la mia religione, era tutto per me.

translation.en: So I'd have to imagine the movies I wanted to see, beginning to end.
translation.it: Quindi, mi immaginavo i film che volevo vedere dall'inizio alla fine.

translation.en: But to this day, I firmly believe
that accident is the only reason I have three Oscars to polish.
translation.it: che sia grazie a quell'incidente se ora ho tre Oscar da lucidare.

translation.en: Because I had a North Star.
translation.it: È stata la mia stella polare.

translation.en: Would that kid in that hospital bed wanna see this movie?
translation.it: Mi sono chiesto se quel bimbo in ospedale avrebbe voluto vedere quel film.

translation.en: That kid was my audience.
Who's yours?
Let's go for a drive.
What are you thinking about?
My mom.
What about her?
You asked who my audience is.
translation.it: Hai chiesto chi fosse il mio pubblico.

translation.en: [Lou] She must be an interesting lady.
[Lisa] I wouldn't know.
Never met her.
She left right after I was born.
I know what I'm about to say is gonna sound crazy.
translation.it: So che ciò che sto per dire sembrerà folle,

translation.en: Actually never said it out loud before but...
translation.it: e non l'ho mai detto ad alta voce,

translation.en: I feel like if I can make my film,
translation.it: ma sento che, se riuscirò a fare il mio film,

translation.en: somehow, she'll see it.
And she'll know it came from me.
translation.it: E saprà che è opera mia.

translation.en: That's beautiful.
You know, I could walk this into a studio a lot easier without you,
translation.it: Sai, sarebbe più facile vendere questo film senza di te,

translation.en: or take it to Alvin with some hotshot music video director,
translation.it: o portarlo da Alvin dicendo che lo girerà un famoso regista di videoclip,

translation.en: but it's about relevance.
translation.it: ma qui si tratta di rilevanza.

translation.en: You know?
You only get so many bites at the apple.
A year in this business is like a decade, and I haven't...
translation.it: Un anno in questo settore vale come dieci,

translation.en: I haven't had a real hit since 1986.
translation.it: e io non rilascio successi dal 1986.

translation.en: I don't wanna know what it's like to disappear.
I need you.
That's the truth.
So Saturday night, Alvin Sender's having a thing at his gallery.
translation.it: Sabato sera, Alvin Sender terrà un evento alla sua galleria.

translation.en: Movie people, movie stars.
translation.it: Con star del cinema e quant'altro.

translation.en: Be a great opportunity to meet Alvin.
It's a date.
[Lou] Well, this should be fun.
We're going as a team.
I'll build you up, get Alvin on your side.
translation.it: Io tesserò le tue lodi con Alvin così,

translation.en: And then when you have the official meeting,
he'll know who you are. Right?
And then when you walk out of that meeting, you'll have a movie.
translation.it: E quando avrai finito di parlargli, avrai il tuo film.

translation.en: Thanks.
Whatever happens, thanks for everything.
[Lou] My pleasure.
I think we make a good team.
I'm sorry. I thought, um...
I'm sorry.
I think we make a good team too.
What's Alvin Sender look like?
[Lou] Like a rich guy.
You know, the masks read your brain waves and turn them into these little movies.
translation.it: Le maschere leggono le loro onde cerebrali e le trasformano in questi filmini.

translation.en: Stay here and look cool.
Bruce! Where the fuck did you get those cigarettes?
translation.it: Bruce! Dove cazzo hai preso quelle sigarette?

translation.en: [Roy] Lisa Nova.
Here you are.
This thing creeps me out.
I know it's bullshit, but I don't want the world to have a window into my mind.
translation.it: So che è una stronzata, ma non voglio che mi si sbirci nella testa.

translation.en: [Lisa] I love it.
What would somebody see if they looked through your window?
translation.it: Cosa vedrebbero, se dovessero sbirciare nella tua testa?

translation.en: I guess it depends on who's looking.
You know that woman?
She's been watching you since you've walked in.
translation.it: Ti osserva da quando sei arrivata.

translation.en: She's probably trying to figure out where you are in the food chain.
translation.it: Starà cercando di capire il tuo posto nella catena alimentare.

translation.en: See you around, maybe.
I've been waiting for the right moment to say hello.
translation.it: Stavo aspettando il momento giusto per salutarti.

translation.en: Do you know me?
The man you came in with is having a very important conversation without you.
translation.it: L'uomo con cui sei venuta sta avendo una conversazione importante senza di te.

translation.en: Who are you?
I'm Boro.
What do you want?
To offer my services.
What is it you do?
For you? I could hurt someone.
translation.it: Per te, potrei fare del male a qualcuno.

translation.en: How?
Will you hold my cat?
-Uh... -Here. Aww....
Okay, baby.
Sometimes, I imagine I'm inside him like he's a house.
translation.it: A volte immagino di essere dentro di lui, come se fosse una casa.

translation.en: You could do that.
Imagine you're inside someone. Say, the man you came here with.
translation.it: Immagina di essere dentro qualcuno, magari l'uomo con cui sei venuta.

translation.en: -Inside of him? -Yes.
Imagine that.
Like he's a house and you're wandering around.
translation.it: Come se fosse una casa in cui vagare.

translation.en: Are you doing it?
Yeah.
No. No, you're not.
Okay.
Imagine...
that you're inside him.
You feel it?
Now, break something.
Done.
-[cat meows] -Oh, yes. I know.
I know.
Here.
I'm at Cortez and Maribel in Boyle Heights.
translation.it: Abito tra la Cortez e la Maribel a Boyle Heights.

translation.en: Come find me. There's no number,
translation.it: Vieni a casa mia. Niente civico,

translation.en: but you'll know it by the white jaguar out front.
translation.it: ma la riconoscerai dal giaguaro bianco sul muro.

translation.en: Bring my cat.
[Lisa] You just took it.
translation.it: Ma te lo sei presa tu.

translation.en: [Lou] I found Alvin.
Taking a piss next to me, can you believe it?
translation.it: Stava pisciando accanto a me. Che roba.

translation.en: The john, man.
Brings everybody together.
-What happened? -Mm.
Craziest thing. We're talking,
and all of a sudden, my nose starts gushing blood,
translation.it: e, all'improvviso, il mio naso inizia a sanguinare

translation.en: like a faucet.
And I haven't done blow since like '85.
I promised my wife. Thank you. [clears throat]
translation.it: L'ho promesso a mia moglie. Grazie.

translation.en: [Lisa] So, where is Alvin now?
Oh, he left. He was on his way out.
Oh, shit, he left. I didn't even get to--
Lisa, relax.
I talked to him.
He's in.
What, just now? In the bathroom? Without watching the short?
translation.it: Adesso? Così, in bagno? Senza neanche vedere il corto?

translation.en: My word's good for him.
Told you we make a great team.
translation.it: Te l'avevo detto: siamo una bella squadra.

translation.en: And he knows I'm directing?
Lisa, Jesus!
What do you do when you get bad news?
It's good.
He's in, I talked to him.
You're welcome.
[Lisa] Why are we stopping?
I think your mother's gonna be proud of you.
translation.it: Credo che tua madre sarebbe fiera di te.

translation.en: What? [grunts]
Nice.
Push in, push in, push in...
Cut.
Get off!
What? What's the problem?
translation.it: Che c'è? Qual è il problema?

translation.en: Misread. [laughs]
You coming?
Like to walk. Okay. All right.
Enjoy the view.
Hi.
[Boro] Bring my cat.
Now, break something.
I could hurt someone.
translation.it: Potrei fare del male a qualcuno.

translation.en: Bring my cat.
[gasps] What the fuck!
Jesus fucking Christ, you're like a fucking serial killer.
translation.it: Cristo santo, sei come un cazzo di serial killer.

translation.en: I knocked. You didn't hear me? Your door was open.
translation.it: Ho bussato, non mi hai sentito? La porta è aperta.

translation.en: I just-- I wanted to see how you were doing with this whole...
translation.it: Volevo solo vedere come stai per via della novità

translation.en: Jules Brandenberg thing.
What Jules Brandenberg thing?
I mean, even he feels weird about it.
translation.it: Anche lui si sente a disagio.

translation.en: What's he feel weird about?
Meeting with Lou.
What's he meeting with Lou for?
To direct your movie.
I thought you knew.
-He's expecting me. -[gasps]
Excuse me! Who are you?
Meet my son, Jonathan, the artist. He's taking a semester off.
translation.it: Lui è mio figlio Jonathan, l'artista. Si è preso un semestre sabbatico.

translation.en: Uh... And this is my falcon, Maverick.
translation.it: E lui è Maverick, il mio falco.

translation.en: Do not mess with this guy. Look at that face.
translation.it: Non scherzare con lui. Guarda che faccia.

translation.en: No sense of humor.
Can we talk in private?
Yeah.
Why am I hearing that Jules Brandenberg is up to direct my film?
translation.it: Perché pare che il mio film lo dirigerà Jules Brandenberg?

translation.en: Hey! I direct!
-We talked about this! -You know precocial animals?
translation.it: - Ne abbiamo parlato! - Hai presente gli animali precoci?

translation.en: -What the fuck? -[Lou] Giraffes are an example.
translation.it: - Che cazzo dici? - Tipo le giraffe.

translation.en: Right after they're born, they stand up.
Covered in placenta and everything. They're all wet and wobbly.
translation.it: Sono ancora coperte di placenta, tutte umide e traballanti.

translation.en: They don't know what walking is,
but they're trying so damn hard to do it anyway.
translation.it: ma cercano di farlo con tutte le loro forze.

translation.en: I'm not gonna give you the rights to my film if I'm not directing it.
translation.it: Non ti darò i diritti del mio film se non sarò io a dirigerlo.

translation.en: Do you know what you signed?
You don't know what you signed.
Learn to walk before you try to run.
translation.it: Devi imparare a camminare, prima di correre.

translation.en: You know? Remember, this is still a very big deal for you.
translation.it: Ricorda che è ancora una grande occasione per te.

translation.en: We had an agreement.
We do have one. We signed it.
Sometimes, you want a filet mignon, and you get a Dodger Dog instead.
translation.it: A volte vorresti un filet mignon e ti becchi un hot dog.

translation.en: But Dodger Dogs are delicious.
translation.it: Ma gli hot dog sono squisiti.

translation.en: You made a promise.
I did make you a promise. And we do have an agreement.
translation.it: È vero. E abbiamo un accordo.

translation.en: Have a seat.
Okay.
This business, this banquet we're all feeding our bellies at,
translation.it: Questo settore, questo banchetto a cui ci rimpinziamo tutti quanti,

translation.en: it's made up of promises and agreements.
translation.it: è fatto di promesse e di accordi.

translation.en: The problem is, you're still learning the difference between them.
translation.it: Il problema è che tu devi ancora imparare la differenza tra gli uni e gli altri.

translation.en: And a promise is an hors d'oeuvre.
translation.it: Una promessa è come un hors d'oeuvre.

translation.en: You know, it's an appetizer that gets passed around.
translation.it: Un antipasto che viene passato ai commensali.

translation.en: "Bacon wrapped date? Thank you, I'd love one."
Then we sit down for the main course. The meat.
translation.it: Poi ci si siede per la portata principale, la carne.

translation.en: That's the agreement.
And you...
ate it.
What changed?
I'm not the bad guy.
I know you want me to be. I understand that.
translation.it: So che vuoi che lo sia, lo capisco,

translation.en: But this world we live in is predators and prey.
translation.it: ma viviamo in un modo di predatori e prede.

translation.en: And each and every one of us is both.
translation.it: E ognuno di noi è entrambe le cose.

translation.en: Say it.
I gotta hear you say it.
What changed?
All right. And you're an artist, right? So it's all material. Use it.
translation.it: E tu sei un'artista. È tutto materiale che puoi usare.

translation.en: Maybe this is news to you, but art is violent, man.
translation.it: Forse non lo sapevi, ma l'arte è violenta.

translation.en: It's selfish. I mean, I-- I thought you knew that.
translation.it: È egoista. Insomma, credevo lo sapessi.

translation.en: "Written and directed by Lisa Nova."
Are you gonna tell me you've never used anybody
translation.it: Vuoi dirmi che non hai mai usato nessuno

translation.en: for the sake of making something?
That there's nobody out there who'd say, "Lisa Nova is selfish"?
translation.it: Che nessuno al mondo potrebbe dire: "Lisa Nova è egoista"?

translation.en: I wanna hear you say it.
What are you punishing me for?
I think we've said enough.
Is that your wife out there?
What's--? What's her name? I could talk to her.
Oh, you don't want me to talk to your wife.
translation.it: Non vuoi che lo faccia, eh?

translation.en: Think.
Very carefully.
Let this be a learning experience.
[Lisa] You're gonna regret it.
[Lou] Lisa?
Rewind!
I can't have you leaving here all upset.
translation.it: Non posso farti andare via così sconvolta.

translation.en: I feel like I left the campsite in worse shape than I found it,
translation.it: È come lasciare il campeggio peggio di come l'hai trovato,

translation.en: which is a major Boy Scout no-no.
translation.it: e un boy-scout non lo fa.

translation.en: What?
Look, there is a reality where you have a very long career.
translation.it: Senti, esiste una realtà in cui hai una lunghissima carriera.

translation.en: Okay, but one of the skills you're going to need...
translation.it: Ma una capacità di cui avrai bisogno

translation.en: is the ability to apologize.
You want me to apologize to you?
translation.it: Vuoi che sia io a scusarmi con te?

translation.en: You just came into my home uninvited.
translation.it: Sei piombata in casa mia senza invito.

translation.en: And you threatened me.
You can't even admit you took my movie, because you're a fucking washed-up fucking--
translation.it: Non ammetti neanche di avermi rubato il film perché sei un fallito del cazzo…

translation.en: What did you say?
What am I? Say it again. Say it again.
You know what you are?
You're a fucking nothing. You're a million fucking wannabes.
translation.it: Una cazzo di nullità. Un'aspirante artista su un milione.

translation.en: I see it every fucking day.
translation.it: È una cosa che vedo ogni giorno.

translation.en: Bet your mother saw the same thing in you.
translation.it: E mi sa che lo capì anche tua madre.

translation.en: Just a meaningless fucking void!
translation.it: Sei solo un'inutile nullità del cazzo!

translation.en: Get the fuck out of my driveway before I call the cops.
translation.it: Vattene dal mio vialetto o chiamo la polizia.

translation.en: You said you could hurt someone for me.
translation.it: Hai detto che faresti del male a qualcuno per me.

translation.en: Is that true?
Where's my cat?
I didn't bring your cat.
Can you help me?
What did he do to you?
[Lisa] He betrayed me.
So what? It happens.
[Lisa] No.
He took the only thing I care about.
translation.it: Si è preso l'unica cosa a cui tengo.

translation.en: So...
Whatever it is you do,
I want you to do it.
To him.
As long as you can pay my rate.
I'll pay you whatever you want.
[Boro] Great. I'll take the first payment upfront.
translation.it: Ottimo. Il primo pagamento lo voglio subito.

translation.en: Do you know how special you are? Do you?
translation.it: Hai idea di quanto tu sia speciale?

translation.en: You have something inside you.
It's tasty.
It's always been there.
Your stuff, your substance.
It's the beginning of all of your thoughts.
translation.it: È l'origine di tutti i tuoi pensieri.

translation.en: And it wants to be born.
You can keep the other cat.
Do we have a deal?
Say what you want.
Say it.
I want my movie back.
And I want to set his life on fire.
-[cat meows] -We can do that.
